## Options interface

Request options sent to the metadata server.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Options 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [headers?](./gcp-metadata.options.headers.md) | OutgoingHttpHeaders | <i>(Optional)</i> Specific HTTP headers to include in the request to the metadata server. |
|  [params?](./gcp-metadata.options.params.md) | { \[index: string\]: string; } | <i>(Optional)</i> Querystring parameters that will be passed to the metadata server with the request. Useful for performing recursive queries. |
|  [property?](./gcp-metadata.options.property.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The specific property path to query from the metadata server. |
